author: ambulance2314
post_text: May 7, 2016 at 2:30 PM#1Is there a way to edit a filter by a macro?

posts.author: ambulance2314
posts.post_text: May 7, 2016 at 2:30 PM#1Is there a way to edit a filter by a macro?

posts.author: glad
posts.post_text: May 10, 2016 at 12:42 AM#2Filters are internally of the same class as worlds (they have similar data structure) which means that the may cross import/exportedas Worlds may be created with the programmer, you could try this workaround to create attribute Filters via commandlinee.g. to create a Dim Filter via commandline:CodeClearAllFixture ThruOn attribute "Dim"Store World 99 "Dim" /overwriteExport World 99 "myfilter" /ncImport "myfilter" At Filter 2 /ncDelete World 99 /nc

posts.author: ambulance2314
posts.post_text: May 10, 2016 at 4:46 PM#3that's nice. thanks for the solution.

title: Edit filters
